Introducing LawnAdmin Client

LawnAdmin Client allows customers of landscaping businesses to check on their outstanding invoice balance, submit service requests and view payment history. LawnAdmin Client allows the client to answer their own questions before reaching out directly to their hired landscape service provider.

Outstanding Balance

Allow your customers to see their current outstanding balance in real time!

Service Requests

Lets customers submit service requests in addition to their contractual agreed upon work

Payment History

Alleviate reconciling payment history with LawnAdmin's Client payment history

Contact us

For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the app or to charge for its services, at any time and for any reason. We will never charge you for the app or its services without making it very clear to you exactly what you’re paying for. The LawnAdmin app stores and processes personal data that you have provided to us, to provide our Service. It’s your responsibility to keep your phone and access to the app secure. We therefore recommend that you do not jailbreak or root your phone, which is the process of removing software restrictions and limitations imposed by the official operating system of your device. It could make your phone vulnerable to malware/viruses/malicious programs, compromise your phone’s security features and it could mean that the LawnAdmin app won’t work properly or at all. If you’re using the app outside of an area with Wi-Fi, you should remember that the terms of the agreement with your mobile network provider will still apply. As a result, you may be charged by your mobile provider for the cost of data for the duration of the connection while accessing the app, or other third-party charges. In using the app, you’re accepting responsibility for any such charges, including roaming data charges if you use the app outside of your home territory (i.e. region or country) without turning off data roaming.
